general.description: Kramer is a backwater, almost devoid of an atmosphere. However, the primary point it has in its favor, the hidden jump point makes it an attractive stop-over point for pirates on deeper raids into the civilized parts of the galaxy.
general.bar: The bar is alive with the fighting and carousing of drunk patrons. A few patrons busy themselves with card games in a corner and the shadier merchants talk business over debatably drinkable alcohol. Truly a pirate bar.
